izmir.title: Izmir
izmir.previewText: Cultural capital of the Aegean coast

fullContent.heading: Izmir Tour
fullContent.paragraph1: Izmir is Turkey's third-largest city, located on the Aegean coast. The city is famous for its rich history, cultural heritage, and modern infrastructure.
fullContent.paragraph2: During the tour, you will visit the ancient city of Ephesus, Kadifekale Castle, Kemeraltı Bazaar, and other attractions.
fullContent.conditions:
• Duration: 7 days
• Accommodation in a 4-star hotel
• Breakfast included
• Airport transfer
fullContent.notes:
• Comfortable shoes recommended
• Don't forget your swimwear
• Additional excursions available

stambul.title: Istanbul
stambul.previewText: City at the crossroads of Europe and Asia

fullContent.heading: Istanbul Tour
fullContent.paragraph1: Istanbul is a unique city connecting Europe and Asia. Here you'll find numerous historical monuments, magnificent mosques, and modern shopping centers.
fullContent.paragraph2: The tour program includes visits to Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace, and other iconic places.
fullContent.conditions:
• Duration: 5 days
• Accommodation in the city center
• Breakfast included
• Airport transfer
fullContent.notes:
• Comfortable shoes recommended
• Appropriate clothing required for mosque visits
• Bosphorus cruise available

fullContent.heading: Antalya Tour
fullContent.paragraph1: Antalya is a popular Mediterranean resort known for its beaches, historic center, and modern hotels.
fullContent.paragraph2: During the tour, you will visit the Old Town Kaleiçi, Düden Waterfall, ancient city of Perge, and other attractions.
fullContent.conditions:
• Duration: 7 days
• Accommodation in a 5-star hotel
• Half board
• Airport transfer
fullContent.notes:
• Don't forget your swimwear
• Bring sunscreen
• Diving available

fullContent.heading: Belek Tour
fullContent.paragraph1: Belek is a prestigious resort known for its world-class golf courses, luxury hotels, and beautiful beaches.
fullContent.paragraph2: The tour program includes golf, visits to the ancient city of Aspendos, and beach relaxation.
fullContent.conditions:
• Duration: 7 days
• Accommodation in a 5-star hotel
• Half board
• Airport transfer
fullContent.notes:
• Golf equipment required
• Don't forget your swimwear
• Spa treatments available

fullContent.heading: Bodrum Tour
fullContent.paragraph1: Bodrum is an elegant resort on the Aegean Sea, known for its nightlife, yachts, and historical attractions.
fullContent.paragraph2: During the tour, you will visit St. Peter's Castle, ancient theater, Mausoleum at Halicarnassus, and other places.
fullContent.conditions:
• Duration: 7 days
• Accommodation in a 4-star hotel
• Breakfast included
• Airport transfer
fullContent.notes:
• Don't forget your swimwear
• Bring sunscreen
• Yacht cruise available

fullContent.heading: Divnoe Tour
fullContent.paragraph1: Divnoe is a cozy resort village on the Black Sea coast, perfect for a quiet family vacation.
fullContent.paragraph2: The tour program includes beach relaxation, visits to local attractions, and local cuisine tasting.
fullContent.conditions:
• Duration: 7 days
• Accommodation in a guest house
• Breakfast included
• Airport transfer
fullContent.notes:
• Don't forget your swimwear
• Bring sunscreen
• Fishing available
